LanguageData.CataphractArmor.label: катафрактарська броня
LanguageData.CataphractArmor.description: Виготовлення катафрактарської броні. Це важка силова броня, що сповільнює користувача, але може поглинути екстремальні пошкодження. Потребує передових компонентів.

CataphractArmor.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->first developed [ANYPAWN_possessive] cataphract-equivalent armor as a method of exploring active volcanoes
subject_story->was commissioned to produce custom sets of cataphract armor for Imperial boarding parties
subject_story->fought with the rebels and studied the armor of a captured cataphract

LanguageData.Gunlink.label: стрілецькі візори
LanguageData.Gunlink.description: Виготовлення стрілецького візору, який покращує точність стрільби.

Gunlink.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->converted a glitterworld ocular implant into a more generic targeting computer
subject_story->was happy at the performance of the factory's gunlinks, though the increased death rate due to helmet loss was troubling
subject_story->bulk-purchased gunlinks for the snipers in the army, forbidding them to front-line soldiers

LanguageData.JumpPack.label: реактивні ранці
LanguageData.JumpPack.description: Виготовлення реактивних рюкзаків, які дають змогу атакувати ворогів з повітря під час бою.

JumpPack.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->operated an entertainment park focused on extreme experiences, including boomrat petting and jump pack courses
subject_story->ran mountaineering tours on low-grav planets, where jump packs and oxygen masks were mandatory
subject_story->bypassed the turret defenses of officer training with a jump pack assault

LanguageData.NobleApparel.label: благородний одяг
LanguageData.NobleApparel.description: Tailor noble-specific apparel like formal shirts and top hats.

NobleApparel.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->crafted formal corsetry for urbworld student graduations
subject_story->was employed by a noble house to shape its top hats
subject_story->invented a new style of beret that was all the rage for an entire season

LanguageData.RoyalApparel.label: королівський одяг
LanguageData.RoyalApparel.description: Пошиття королівського одягу найвищого класу, такого як королівські мантії та корони.

RoyalApparel.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked for an entire year to create royal robes for a coronation
subject_story->studied the heraldric requirements of different noble groups to ensure any outfits were appropriate
subject_story->was raised to the Imperial nobility and commissioned their own robes and coronet
